description:
Dynamically generate social elements for Facebook, Google +, Twitter.

The supported widgets are:

Like button
Tweet button
Facebook comment box
Google Plus button
Facebook subscribe button
Like box
Activity feed
Follow
name: cf_socialplugin

examples.title: Like Button
examples.code:
<cf_socialplugin type = "like"
 url = ""
 layout = "standard|box_count|button_count"
 showfaces = "true|false"
 verb = "like|recommend"
 colorscheme = "light|dark"
 style = ""
 width = ""
 extraoptions = ""
>
